description:
sql: add Rows.Columns

Also, fix package name in error messages.

Fixes issue 2453

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

http://codereview.appspot.com/5483088/diff/4001/src/pkg/exp/sql/sql.go
File src/pkg/exp/sql/sql.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5483088/diff/4001/src/pkg/exp/sql/sql.go#newcode740
src/pkg/exp/sql/sql.go:740: // Columns returns the column names.
Say when it can fail?
It's a little surprising to me that it can.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=e22a8db91330 ***

sql: add Rows.Columns

Also, fix package name in error messages.

Fixes issue 2453

CC=golang-dev
